name: A mysterious figure in a dark cloak

conv.text: You have returned! I have been expecting you. The world is not safe for anyone, you must stay grounded and cannot move. Do you understand?
Good. You must remember this warning, for the world is not as it once was. Now go, and be safe.
It is dangerous to move around in this world. You must stay grounded and cannot move. Do you understand now?
It is too dangerous for you to move around in this world. You must stay grounded and cannot move. Do you understand now?
You must stay grounded and cannot move. It is the only way to stay safe in this world. Do you understand now?
I cannot stress this enough. You must stay grounded and cannot move. It is the only way to stay safe in this world. Do you understand now?
I'm sorry, but I cannot help you any further. You must stay grounded and cannot move. It is the only way to stay safe in this world. Goodbye.
Hello again, Brave Adventurer. I have been watching you, and I can see that you are determined to find a safe place in this post-apocalyptic world. Is that true?

answers.option: Yes, I am determined to find a safe place.
No, I am not sure what I am looking for.

conv.text: I can help you. I have been here for a long time and I know the secrets of this world. Are you ready to learn?

answers.option: Yes, I am ready to learn.
No, I am not ready yet.

conv.text: That is ok. You will find what you are looking for if you stay determined. I can help you if you are ready to learn.

conv.text: Good. I will tell you the secrets of this world, but you must remember to stay grounded and not move. Do you understand?
